titleStmt.title: A new adventure, for law-books to be disposed of by lot, wherein all are gainers.
titleStmt.author: Browne, Daniel, 1647-1727.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Daniel Browne. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: broadside stained and torn with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
